| HistoryText             = The royal guard of the [[Kree]]/[[Deviant Skrulls|Skrull]] [[Kree/Skrull Alliance (Earth-616)|Alliance]] originally consisted of [[Kl'rt (Earth-616)|Super-Skrull]], [[Glah-Ree (Earth-616)|Captain Glory]], [[Mur-G'nn (Earth-616)|Mur-G'nn]] and [[R'Klll (Earth-616)|Empress R'Klll]] under the identity of [[Tanalth (Earth-616)|Tanalth the Pursuer]]. They were assembled to serve the Alliance's figurehead, [[Theodore Altman (Earth-616)|Emperor Hulkling]].{{r|Lords of Empyre: Emperor Hulkling Vol 1 1}}

During the Alliance's war against the [[Cotati]] on [[Earth]], Empress R'Klll staged a coup with Captain Glory's help, during which she captured and impersonated Hulkling.{{r|Empyre Vol 1 5}} Following the defeat of the Cotati and the thwarting of R'Klll's coup, Hulkling demoted Super-Skrull to diplomatic service in revenge for his murder of [[Mary-Jo Altman (Earth-616)|Mary-Jo Altman]]. Hulkling attempted to punish Glory with diplomatic posting as well, but Glory refused, instead agreeing to a life sentence in a penal stockade.{{r|Empyre: Aftermath Avengers Vol 1 1}}
